attributes.action: Reduce the time school ends on Friday
attributes.additional_details: because many students across the UK are suffering from depression and their mental health is at a bad rate. This is highly due to overwork and ending early on a Friday would help students mental wellbeing
attributes.background: I want every school in the UK to make Fridays ends 2pm or before

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for similar action:

"Mandate seven-hour days Monday to Thursday in schools for shorter Fridays" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/741610
